amendment.description: Amendment addresses the lack of minority representation in the cybersecurity industry including women and African-Americans, Hispanics, and Native Americans. Amendment adds language which describes how successful programs are engaging those minorities and which includes minority-serving institutions on the Cybersecurity University-Industry Task Force.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 111-410 to address the lack of minority representation in the cybersecurity industry including women and African-Americans, Hispanics, and Native Americans. The amendment adds language in Sec. 107 to describe how successful programs are engaging said minorities and in Sec. 108 to include minority-serving institutions on the Cybersecurity University-Industry Task Force.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 5 (Roll no. 34).
